message: Anyone?
Um... what is a bronie?
Oh my god, get out of here. I'm taking your name off the beta list :P
Who, me?
Okay, I have now been enlightened as to the definition of "Bronie". Creepy.
@Ahlisendar no, the other guy. :P (and I'm kidding, of course, all are welcome...even bronies, I guess)
Friendship is magic!
Stoneship is magic! Wait...what?
I am magic!
@Zib I do hope you had to look the term up as well...
Yeah, urban speak can get a bit extensive.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rwp60eYuie0&feature=related
Uh, stuff.
No, I am (unfortunately) well-acquainted with the existence of Bronies
Can we like, delete this topic? :p
Please god.
But I love my little ponies!
Starry Expanse team displaying prejudice against pony lovers. Finest hour.
Zib and Ironmagma need to be about twenty percent cooler.
erm, yeah, that pretty much sums it up.
Maybe... If you like more kinds of things, more kinds of people will think you are cool..?
Wait, are you saying liking ponies will make them cooler?!
Wait, we don't even know if this kraidridley guy IS a bronie!
..er, "brony".
In theory that works, but in practice...
Take a look at his profile picture.
But what if he turns out to be a Brony-poser? Or worse, if he turns out to be a she? Then this topic is named all wrong (oh noes!) and it should've been Sissies! Anyone?
Nope; http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kBQEoi_gSBI

Nah, I'm not out to convert EVERYBODY into a brony.  "Needs to be twenty percent cooler" is my response to people who just have a knee-jerk reaction to anything associated with My Little Pony.  MLP:FiM is so far removed from anything else in the franchise in terms of tone and in quality that it ought to be treated as its own franchise.  Basically, I just pretend that anything that Hasbro produced on that front before October of last year doesn't exist.  Oh, and I also must protest against anyone who refuses to watch because the main characters are girls.  To them, my response is thus: http://www.hiveworkshop.com/forums/attachments/off-topic-478/100251d1301351666-my-little-pony-friendship-magic-orbital-friendship-beam.jpg
Ok, it has been a real laugh so far. How long do we expect this topic to stay anyway?
FOREEEEEEVERRRRR!
Challenge: make this topic relevant...

The original question was intended to gather information about the Starry Expanse community.  It is therefore, to some extent, relevant (or it's at least less of a stretch to call relevant than the Steve Jobs thread).  This thread can't be that bad, right?  It's reducing the odds that you'll encounter numerous isolated pony posts in thread about actual work, after all.  Getting back on topic here, today marks the one-year anniversary of MLP:FiM.  Happy birthday!
Also, I haven't even seen this kraidridley guy since he created this bronie thread! Maybe he died of Die-a-betes.
You may think that this thread is more relevant than the steve jobs one, but really I think we have more apple-heads than bronies.
So Sisters Who Love Ponies don't exist? Sissies remains to mean what it used to mean, no expansion of it's use has sprung to life?
@Ahlisendar you mean /dies à bêtes/?
I did some Research on the topic and came up with this: http://www.reddit.com/r/mylittlepony/comments/jdv6a/what_are_female_bronies_called/

I'm surprised and sad at all the animosity in the Myst/Uru community towards bronies.  Certainly, opinions are mixed in practically every community on the subject, but from what I've gathered, the majority of the Myst/Uru community's reactions to MLP and its fan base have either been "not interested" or "ew!"  :(
So I'm just going to mute this :P
I've had a look at the series since this topic was started, genuinely wanting to find out whether it interests me, but I can't say I've found it does...
@ironmagma it was just a dumb little pun I made up. You DIE of DIEabetes...
Wait, it seems I may have misread your comment. Oh well.
Sigh.
Okay... what was that for?
Stuff.

Look, I know you don't like the show.  And you can go ahead and disagree with me if I say I think it's good.  But there wasn't even anything going on in this thread when you posted that.  And you even had the last comment.  Doesn't that qualify as a waste of your time?

The following is RR's personal statement. Added stars may eventually point out agreement by others, but so far I type this comment out of impulse: It is hard for me to take any of this thread seriously and up till now I haven't treated it as if I were. Still the content isn't target of my current comment. However I did notice someone taking a defensive stance. Whatever is defended surely justifies this to the defender. However, the moment one starts defending this person feels there is an attack. If that assumption is correct it is implied that there is a fight going on here, or one is being brought into this 'forum'. Both scenarios yield unwanted responses and may eventually derail the fun and cooperative nature, under which circumstances this 'forum' was set up.
Stuff.
Wait, what?

Looking back, I have become surprisingly militant about something about which it makes no sense whatsoever.  I am sorry for causing such a problem and I'm going to back out now before there is need to point out my fallacy any further.

And by the way, I said "stuff", because it is an actual word in the language of flrjeunkdmysh lunktug urfjalod minor, sector P.M. ilgruntrlynng gryraloft (or FLUMPMIG for short). "Stuff" loosely translates to, "boy, I sure am bored. By the way, what's for dinner? Anyway, I was wondering when that reward for reaching $2000 was going to come out... never mind. But seriously, when's it gonna come out?"/
Starry Expanse on Convore: Bronies and Ahlisendar ramblings.
Basically.
Yes, I tend to do that. I have a lot to say ;).
www.wordpress.com

I already have a blog. I just have very high standards about what things I say in it, so the rest leaks out in things like chatrooms and comment strings. You may now kiss the bride. I hope you enjoy the flight.
